verses.verse: In the beginning <WH7225> God <WH430> created <WH1254> the heavens <WH8064> and <WH853> the earth <WH776>.

And the earth <WH776> was <WH1961> waste <WH8414> and void <WH922>; and darkness <WH2822> was upon the face <WH6440> of the deep <WH8415>: and the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> moved <WH7363> upon <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the waters <WH4325>.
And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let there be <WH1961> light <WH216>: and there was light <WH216>.
And God <WH430> saw <WH7200> the light <WH216>, that <WH3588> it was good <WH2896>: and God <WH430> divided <WH914> the light <WH216> from <WH996> the darkness <WH2822>.

And God <WH430> called <WH7121> the light <WH216> Day <WH3117>, and the darkness <WH2822> he called <WH7121> Night <WH3915>. And there was evening <WH6153> and there was morning <WH1242>, one <WH259> day <WH3117>.
And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let there be a firmament <WH7549> in the midst <WH8432> of the waters <WH4325>, and let it divide <WH914> the waters <WH4325> from the waters <WH4325>.

And God <WH430> made <WH6213> the firmament <WH7549>, and divided <WH914> the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were under <WH8478> the firmament <WH7549> from the waters <WH4325> which <WH834> were above <WH5921> the firmament <WH7549>: and it was so <WH3651>.
And God <WH430> called <WH7121> the firmament <WH7549> Heaven <WH8064>. And there was evening <WH6153> and there was morning <WH1242>, a second <WH8145> day <WH3117>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let the waters <WH4325> under the heavens <WH8064> be gathered together <WH6960> unto <WH413> one <WH259> place <WH4725>, and let the dry <WH3004> land appear <WH7200>: and it was so.

And God <WH430> called <WH7121> the dry <WH3004> land Earth <WH776>; and the gathering together <WH4723> of the waters <WH4325> called <WH7121> he Seas <WH3220>: and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good <WH2896>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let the earth <WH776> put forth <WH1876> grass <WH1877>, herbs <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed <WH2233>, and fruit-trees <WH6086> bearing <WH6213> fruit <WH6529> after their kind <WH4327>, wherein <WH834> is the seed <WH2233> thereof <WH776>, upon the earth: and it was so.

And the earth <WH776> brought forth <WH3318> grass <WH1877>, herbs <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed <WH2233> after their kind <WH4327>, and trees <WH6086> bearing <WH6213> fruit <WH6529>, wherein is the seed <WH2233> thereof <WH4327>, after their kind: and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good <WH2896>.
And there was evening <WH6153> and there was morning <WH1242>, a third <WH7992> day <WH3117>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let there be lights <WH3974> in the firmament <WH7549> of heaven <WH8064> to divide <WH914> the day <WH3117> from the night <WH3915>; and let them be for signs <WH226>, and for seasons <WH4150>, and for days <WH3117> and years <WH8141>:
and let them be for lights <WH3974> in the firmament <WH7549> of heaven <WH8064> to give light <WH215> upon the earth <WH776>: and it was so.

And God <WH430> made <WH6213> the two <WH8147> great <WH1419> lights <WH3974>; the greater <WH1419> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the day <WH3117>, and the lesser <WH6996> light <WH3974> to rule <WH4475> the night <WH3915>: he made the stars also <WH3556>.
And God <WH430> set <WH5414> them in the firmament of heaven <WH8064> to give light <WH215> upon the earth <WH776>,
and to rule <WH4910> over the day <WH3117> and over the night <WH3915>, and to divide <WH914> the light <WH216> from the darkness <WH2822>: and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good <WH2896>.
And there was evening <WH6153> and there was morning <WH1242>, a fourth <WH7243> day <WH3117>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let the waters <WH4325> swarm <WH8317> with swarms <WH8317> of living <WH2416> creatures <WH5315>, and let birds <WH5775> fly <WH5774> above <WH5921> the earth <WH776> in the open <WH6440> firmament <WH7549> of heaven <WH8064>.

And God <WH430> created <WH1254> the great <WH1419> sea-monsters <WH8577>, and every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that moveth <WH7430>, wherewith the waters <WH4325> swarmed <WH8317>, after their kind <WH4327>, and every winged <WH3671> bird <WH5775> after its kind <WH4327>: and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good <WH2896>.

And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> them <WH559>, saying, Be fruitful <WH6509>, and multiply <WH7235>, and fill <WH4390> the waters <WH4325> in the seas <WH3220>, and let birds <WH5775> multiply <WH7235> on the earth <WH776>.
And there was evening <WH6153> and there was morning <WH1242>, a fifth <WH2549> day <WH3117>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let the earth <WH776> bring forth <WH3318> living <WH2416> creatures <WH5315> after their kind <WH4327>, cattle <WH929>, and creeping things <WH7431>, and beasts of the earth <WH776> after their kind <WH4327>: and it was so.

And God <WH430> made <WH6213> the beasts <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> after their kind <WH4327>, and the cattle <WH929> after their kind <WH4327>, and everything that creepeth <WH7431> upon the ground <WH127> after its kind <WH4327>: and God <WH430> saw <WH7200> that it was good <WH2896>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Let us make <WH6213> man <WH120> in our image <WH6754>, after our likeness <WH1823>: and let them have dominion <WH7287> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea <WH3220>, and over the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and over the cattle <WH929>, and over all the earth <WH776>, and over every creeping thing <WH7431> that creepeth <WH7430> upon the earth <WH776>.
And God <WH430> created <WH1254> man <WH120> in his own image <WH6754>, in the image <WH6754> of God <WH430> created <WH1254> he him <WH2145>; male and female <WH5347> created he them <WH1254>.

And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> them <WH430>: and God said <WH559> unto them <WH6509>, Be fruitful, and multiply <WH7235>, and replenish <WH4390> the earth <WH776>, and subdue it <WH3533>; and have dominion <WH7287> over the fish <WH1710> of the sea <WH3220>, and over the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and over every living thing <WH2416> that moveth <WH7430> upon the earth <WH776>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559>, Behold <WH2009>, I have given <WH5414> you every herb <WH6212> yielding <WH2232> seed <WH2233>, which is upon the face <WH6440> of all the earth <WH776>, and every tree <WH6086>, in which is the fruit <WH6529> of a tree <WH6086> yielding <WH2232> seed <WH2233>; to you it shall be <WH1961> for food <WH402>:

and to every beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776>, and to every bird <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and to everything that creepeth <WH7430> upon the earth <WH776>, wherein there is life <WH2416>, I have given every green <WH3418> herb <WH6212> for food <WH402>: and it was so.

And God <WH430> saw <WH7200> everything that <WH834> he had made <WH6213>, and <WH3966>, behold, it was very good <WH2896>. And there was evening <WH6153> and there was morning <WH1242>, the sixth <WH8345> day <WH3117>.
